com.geodrop.SMSOut

Class SMSStatusRange

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.geodrop.GeodropRequest
      • com.geodrop.SMSOut.SMSStatusRange

  • public class SMSStatusRange
extends GeodropRequest
    Request used to retrieve the status of all SMS messages sent in a given time interval.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    A-Tono s.r.l.
